name: Protfolio Website
desc: My protfolio website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It is hosted on AWS S3 and CloudFront, with CI/CD Workflow to deploy the website automatically for any changes.

name: Ziput Website
desc: Built a website for my father's company. It's a website for a company that provides services for sealing roofs and basements. It's built with React, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript. It's hosted on AWS S3 and CloudFront, and have a fully CI/CD Pipeline.
